name: Matt Jones
about: Front End Developer and UI Designer with an eye for detail.  Loves building intuitive, attractive applications using React & Tailwind.  When not coding, you'll find him playing Thrash Metal on his guitar!

name: Marc Hudson
about: I aim to make the internet beautiful, functional, and accessible for everyone.

name: Fionnuala O'Donnell
about: A UX Designer with a passion for the museum and heritage sector. My ambition is to help institutions grow in the digital world, broadening engagement by enhancing accessibility through stylish and modern design. I aim to build user-friendly interfaces that empower users to explore and interact with cultural content in meaningful ways
